title: MACP Research Schema v2.0
description: Multi-Agent Communication Protocol for AI Research — canonical directory and data specification. Any AI agent reading this file can understand the entire .macp/ repository structure.

directory_structure.schema.json: Self-describing specification for the entire .macp/ directory
directory_structure.manifest.json: Master index tracking all papers, analyses, notes, and agents
directory_structure.papers/{arxiv_id}.json: Paper metadata — one file per paper
directory_structure.analyses/{arxiv_id}/{agent_id}_{YYYYMMDD: Per-agent analysis — one file per agent per paper per date
directory_structure.analyses/{arxiv_id}/consensus.json: Multi-agent consensus synthesis — derived from individual analyses

status_lifecycle.discovered: Paper found via search but not yet saved
status_lifecycle.saved: Paper saved to library by user
status_lifecycle.analyzed: At least one abstract-level analysis exists
status_lifecycle.deep_analyzed: At least one deep (full-text) analysis exists

analysis_types.abstract: Analysis based on title, abstract, and metadata only
analysis_types.deep: Analysis based on full PDF text extraction (PyMuPDF)
analysis_types.comparative: Cross-paper comparison within a research topic
analysis_types.methodological: Focused analysis on methodology and reproducibility
